WifiIface.Des: The system section contains settings that apply to the most basic operation of the system.

OptionFields.Name: mode
OptionFields.Description: Selects the operation mode of the wireless interface.

OptionFields.Name: disabled
OptionFields.Description: When set to 1, wireless network is disabled.

OptionFields.Name: ssid
OptionFields.Description: The broadcasted SSID of the wireless network.

OptionFields.Name: macaddr
OptionFields.Description: Overrides the MAC address used for the wifi interface.

OptionFields.Name: network
OptionFields.Description: Specifies the network interface to attach the wireless to.
